parks.name: Yosemite National Park
parks.description: Famous for its granite cliffs, waterfalls, and giant sequoias.
parks.notableWildlife: Black bears, mule deer, peregrine falcons
parks.parkHighlights: Half Dome, Yosemite Falls, El Capitan

parks.name: Yellowstone National Park
parks.description: Home to geysers, hot springs, and diverse wildlife.
parks.parkHighlights: Old Faithful, Grand Prismatic Spring, Yellowstone Lake

parks.name: Zion National Park
parks.description: Known for steep red cliffs and scenic canyon hikes.
parks.bestTimeToVisit: March through May and September through November
parks.parkHighlights: Angels Landing, The Narrows, Emerald Pools

parks.name: Grand Canyon National Park
parks.description: Iconic views of a mile-deep canyon carved by the Colorado River.
parks.bestTimeToVisit: March through May and September through November
parks.parkHighlights: South Rim, Bright Angel Trail, Desert View Watchtower

parks.name: Rocky Mountain National Park
parks.description: High-altitude trails, alpine lakes, and snowy peaks.
parks.parkHighlights: Trail Ridge Road, Bear Lake, Longs Peak

parks.name: Great Smoky Mountains National Park
parks.description: Lush forests and mist-covered mountain ranges.
parks.parkHighlights: Clingmans Dome, Cades Cove, Roaring Fork

parks.name: Arches National Park
parks.bestTimeToVisit: March through May and September through October
parks.parkHighlights: Delicate Arch, Landscape Arch, The Windows

parks.name: Acadia National Park
parks.description: Rocky beaches, woodlands, and Cadillac Mountain views.
parks.parkHighlights: Cadillac Mountain, Jordan Pond, Thunder Hole

parks.name: Olympic National Park
parks.description: Diverse ecosystems from glacial peaks to temperate rainforests.
parks.parkHighlights: Hoh Rain Forest, Hurricane Ridge, Rialto Beach

parks.name: Joshua Tree National Park
parks.description: Desert landscapes where the Mojave and Colorado deserts meet.
parks.bestTimeToVisit: March to May and October to November
parks.parkHighlights: Hidden Valley, Cholla Cactus Garden, Skull Rock

parks.name: Glacier National Park
parks.description: Known for its rugged mountains and scenic drives.
parks.parkHighlights: Going-to-the-Sun Road, Grinnell Glacier, Lake McDonald

parks.name: Bryce Canyon National Park
parks.description: Famous for crimson-colored hoodoos and starry skies.
parks.notableWildlife: Prairie dogs, mule deer, golden eagles
parks.parkHighlights: Bryce Amphitheater, Navajo Loop, Sunrise Point

parks.name: Sequoia National Park
parks.description: Home to giant sequoia trees, including General Sherman Tree.
parks.parkHighlights: General Sherman Tree, Moro Rock, Crystal Cave

park.name: Yosemite National Park
park.description: Famous for its granite cliffs, waterfalls, and giant sequoias.

park.name: Acadia National Park
park.description: Coastal mountains, rocky shorelines, and scenic hiking on the Atlantic coast.
